snippet.title: Bittersweet Birthday - Announcement trailer | PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox
snippet.description:
You wake up...dazed, and with no memories. As you ask yourself where you are and how you got there, a strange voice breaks through the speaker system offering you a way out. Unstable individuals are hunting you down and it looks like your only chance of escape...is to listen...

Bittersweet Birthday is an action game where every combat encounter is a challenging and unique experience. Learn your enemy's patterns, plan your movements and tear down your opponent in fierce battles that combine Soulslike dodge roll mechanics with bullet hell mayhem.

Outside of battle, uncover the mysteries surrounding your past through exploration and a colorful cast of characters. Complete side quests and discover secret items to unlock Memories that affect your style of combat. Good or bad, use these mementos to lighten the load or add extra challenge to your encounters.

Among the traumas and the broken memories, gather up the pieces of your past and get ready... You've got a birthday party to attend!

FEATURES
- A story of mystery driven by endearing characters!
- A lively village with friendly residents and interlocking quests ready to explore!
- Punishing combat where reading the enemy is the key to victory!
- A darts mini-game! Well, darts are being used, at least...
- A Gachapon machine with 48 collectibles up for grabs!
- Hand drawn pixel-art with beautifully designed backgrounds!
- Heart-touching tunes that will stay with you forever!
- Dog!

Coming in Q2 2025! Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1581100/Bittersweet_Birthday/
